text: Michael J. Elliott, OBE (31 May 1951 - 14 July 2016) was a British journalist and executive. He was the president and chief executive officer of the anti- poverty advocacy organization ONE. He was awarded an OBE in 2003 for services to journalism. Elliott previously held senior executive positions at Time magazine, Newsweek, and The Economist. Elliott died on 14 July 2016 in Washington, D.C. from bladder cancer, aged 65. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:Cancer deaths in Washington, D.C. title: Michael J. Elliott
